channel.title: Need help with d full helms glitch
channel.description:
Ok so im useing a devolution v7 and i have added skillcapes,godwars items,and alot of other things but i need help with the dragon full helm.
I have it set up in the helmet spot now but when ever you wear it you can see little spots of your head throught it.I have this same problem with skillcape hoods.
Can any one help me solve this problem it should be pretty easy because im good at codeing.
heres a screen shot of my problem.
[IMG]http://i517.photobucket.com/albums/u332/OfficialTWG/fulldhelmglitch.jpg[/img]

item.title: Need help with d full helms glitch
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

put it in the fullmask spot as well as helmet.

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“WRX`, post:2, topic:249144”]“it should be pretty easy because im good at codeing.”
You mean you are good at following tutorials.

Where exactly can you see through?[/quote] i added a picture so you can see[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2008, 07:55:25 am[/size][hr]please any one help me
